author: Jiggajogga
title: Good, clean hotel within easy distance of Metro
text: Have stayed here numerous times and never had problems. The room linen is changed and the room and shower room cleaned daily. We always go out for breakfast, this year we had orange juice, croissants with butter and ham, and fried eggs with ham and toasted ficelle (the thin batons of French bread) and coffee for less than â‚¬9!
